title: Leading with Impact
description:
Leading with Impact invites you to your journey as a leader. The opening questions for the module are: How am I doing as a leader? How can I lead more effectively, with more impact? Related to this question are others such as “What does it mean to be an effective leader?” “What is the impact of leaders, and how to assess leaders’ effectiveness and impact?” This module will address different social entities that leaders encounter. 

To answer the above questions, the module offers an extensive examination of leadership in and outside organizations. It aims to provide you with a set of
experiences that are designed to enhance your selfawareness and your capacity for effective leadership.
